source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Microsoft SharePoint Server 2013 Training - Admin (70-331)
items.headline: Learn How To Install, Configure, Administrate And Secure Microsoft SharePoint Server 2013
objectives_summary: Learn How To Install, Configure, Administrate And Secure SharePoint Server 2013

items.title: Outlook 2016 Introduction
items.headline: This course is designed to teach students the basics of Microsoft Outlook 2016.
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of Microsoft Outlook
Create and Send Messages
Organize Mail with Folders

items.title: The Complete Microsoft Excel Course -From Beginner To Expert
items.headline: Using Real World Examples to Go From Beginner to Excel Guru. Ace the Interview, Build Confidence and get your Dream Job!
objectives_summary: Analyze and Reconcile Data using Microsoft Excel
Learn how to solve real world problems that come up everyday in the business world.
Learn how to think like a problem solver rather than just learn how to do things in Excel

items.title: Learn Microsoft Power BI
items.headline: Learn how to turn data into information by creating dashboards to share with your colleagues/friends
objectives_summary: Transform data into interactive visualisations to tell a story
Turn data into insight with Power BI and share it with others
Develop data modelling skills

items.title: Microsoft 365 OneNote Online - Beginner
items.headline: Students will learn the basics of OneNote Online in Microsoft 365, including how to create a notebook and add content.
objectives_summary: Work with OneNote
Create a New Notebook
Add and Format Content

items.title: 2021 Professional MS EXCEL Course with Real Applications

visible_instructors.name: SMARTER
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn SMARTER, not Harder ... Learn to build Career
visible_instructors.title: SMARTER ACADEMY

items.headline: Master MS Excel with applications and Boost your Career and Business
objectives_summary: Excel Cells and Calculations
Compound Formulas and computations
TOP MS EXCEL Templates for different Business applications

items.title: Learn how to simplified HR Reports
items.headline: Simplified HR Reports with Excel
objectives_summary: Create simplified HR reports
Create more convenient reports

items.title: The Ultimate Microsoft Excel 2013 Training Bundle - 19 Hours
items.headline: The Drop-Dead Simple Method to Mastering Microsoft Excel 2013, Without Books, in Less Time Than You Thought
objectives_summary: Practice with included exercise files.
Data entry, cell formatting, working with multiple worksheets and the “Ribbon” interface.
Tips for mouse and touch screen users.

items.title: Learn MS Excel from Scratch
items.headline: Microsoft Excel (2007, 2010, 2013, 2016)
objectives_summary: Formulas and Functions
Sorting Data Quickly
Filtering Data

items.title: BeyondFormulas: Complete MS Excel Techniques & Modeling

visible_instructors.job_title: Excel Modeling Guru, and published author
visible_instructors.title: Brandon Trew
visible_instructors.name: Brandon

items.headline: Learn all crucial Microsoft Excel Techniques & How to apply them to real-world business modeling problems
objectives_summary: Take any business problem, and solve it using structured (consulting-like) problem solving tools
Analyze data in excel using all of the most useful excel tools for real world data analysis
Get around excel like a pro with an excel keyboard shortcut game

items.title: Microsoft SharePoint 2013 Foundation and Server 2013 Bundle
items.headline: Get 16 hours of SharePoint 2013 training and discover how to make team collaboration more effective and productive.
objectives_summary: Build a SharePoint site and create user permissions
Discover how to setup users and create groups
An introduction to project task lists and managing libraries

items.title: Become the Excel Hero with Advanced Excel Tricks for Job
items.headline: Get Any Excel Job Done at Work Using Excel Ninja Tricks (For All Excel Versions 2003, 2007, 2013, 2016)
objectives_summary: Learn to think Excel!
Learn how data should actually look like!
Learn how to do the most common office tasks very quickly and precise

items.title: Intro to Excel Macros Part 1

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course explains step-by-step process of creating and using macros—one of Excel’s most powerful features.
objectives_summary: Discover how to create general-use macros with the Relative Reference setting for Excel’s Macro Recorder.
Recognize when to use the Hide and Unhide commands in an Excel Personal Macro Workbook.
Identify how to apply Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) macros in Excel.

items.title: Visually Stunning Microsoft Excel Dynamic Dashboard Course
items.headline: Become an Excel Dashboard Expert : 11 Basic, 3 Intermediate and 4 Advanced Level Dynamic Dashboards without any VBA code
objectives_summary: The Art of creating Visually Stunning Excel Dashboards.
You will start with 11 Basic Level Dashboards and gradually move to 3 Intermediate and 4 Advanced Level Charts.
Practicing the charts along with the course will make you a Master of MS Excel Dashboards.

items.title: Microsoft Access Networking 2: Maximum Security
items.headline: Control what users can and can't do in your networked database.
objectives_summary: Secure an Access database so that users do not have the ability to change forms or programs.

items.title: 60 Minutes to Learn Excel Tutorial
items.headline: One of the fastest and easiest ways to learn MS Excel 2013
objectives_summary: Master over 60 skills to effectively create, work upon, save and share spreadsheets/workbooks.
The skills will enable learners to perform number processing, use formulae, applying formatting
Adding images, conditional formatting, and visual data representation in graphs and charts.
